pageTitle: Re: Pre-Sharpened K5II studio comparison file compared to K5IIs file: Pentax SLR Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Mike http://flickr.com/rc-soar Both the K-5II and IIs are capable of splendid results, but your work validates my choice to go with the II. Moire on the other hand, though rare, has the potential to cause problems, and it's much more difficult to deal with post capture. Great work, Phil. You've demonstrated what the reviews don't tell us, and what some of us have have been saying all along: that any loss of sharpness due to the AA filter is easily dealt by -- hide signature --
